newsitem.title: EU: EP WOMEN'S RIGHTS COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 11.
newsitem.headline: EP WOMEN'S RIGHTS COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 11.

text.p: Committee on Women's Rights [[ Monday 11 November 1996 ]] ************** EXTRAORDINARY MEETING ******************** 0.1 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.535 ) 2. Equal treatment for men and women - social security schemes (amendment of Di rective 86/378 following Barber judgment) (T03741) (T03741) CNS95117 COM(95)0186 C4-0422/95 + FEMM Fond R TORRES MARQUES H. (PSE) (PE214.960/DEF) - Further exchange of views on compromise amendments pursuant to Rule 60(2) of t he Rules of Procedure 3. Any other business 4. Date of next meeting in Brussels (PE/XIX/OJ/96-15 ) - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
